testcase.name: test

error.message:
### Error querying database. Cause: java.sql.SQLException: ORA-01045: user ORACLEJAVA lacks CREATE SESSION privilege; logon denied
### The error may exist in mybatis/BoardMapper.xml ### The error may involve dao.BoardDAO.getBoardList ### The error occurred while executing a query ### Cause: java.sql.SQLException: ORA-01045: user ORACLEJAVA lacks CREATE SESSION privilege; logon denied
